Package com.epam.services.impl

Class UserServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.epam.services.impl.UserServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserService
public class UserServiceImpl extends Object implements UserService
User Service implementation. It contains methods to interact with the DAO and has some business logic.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Hrebenozhko Ruslan

  • Method Details

    • login

      public UserDTO login(String login, String password) throws UserNotFoundException, UserServiceException
      This method takes a credential and checks if a user with those credentials exists, if so returns a UserDTo for that user. It uses PasswordUtil to hash password.
      Specified by:
      login in interface UserService
      Parameters:
      login - login of the user.
      password - password of the user.
      Returns:
      return UserDTO of the user with this credentials.
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - is thrown when user with these credentials does not exists.
      UserServiceException - is thrown when something wrong happens in the DAO layer.

    • registerUser

      public void registerUser(UserForm userForm) throws UserAlreadyExistException, UserServiceException
      This method takes the user form and tries to add user to DAO. It generates random password for the user and sends it to user's email. It uses PasswordUtil to generate password for the user.
      Specified by:
      registerUser in interface UserService
      Parameters:
      userForm - contains all necessary fields to add new subscriber. It should be valid, method not validate this form.
      Throws:
      UserAlreadyExistException - is thrown when user is already in the persistent layer.
      UserServiceException - is thrown when something wrong happens in the DAO layer.

    • getAllSubscribers

      public List<UserDTO> getAllSubscribers() throws UserServiceException
      This method returns all subscribers from the persistent layer.
      Specified by:
      getAllSubscribers in interface UserService
      Returns:
      all subscribers from the persistent layer.
      Throws:
      UserServiceException - is thrown when something wrong happens in the DAO layer.

    • getSubscriberForCharging

      public List<UserDTO> getSubscriberForCharging() throws UserServiceException
      This method returns all subscribers from the persistent layer that has unblocked status and has tariffs with days until next payment equals to 0.
      Specified by:
      getSubscriberForCharging in interface UserService
      Returns:
      all subscribers from the persistent layer that has unblocked status and has tariffs with days until next payment equals to 0.
      Throws:
      UserServiceException - is thrown when something wrong happens in the DAO layer.

    • viewSubscribers

      public List<UserDTO> viewSubscribers(String searchField, int page, int entriesPerPage) throws UserServiceException
      This method return filtered and sorted by some parameters list of UserDTO.
      Specified by:
      viewSubscribers in interface UserService
      Parameters:
      searchField - A string that represents the sortable field.(e.g. "name", "rate")
      page - A number of the page to view. Starts from 1.
      entriesPerPage - A number of the records in the page.
      Returns:
      List of UserDTO for given sorting and filtering parameters.
      Throws:
      UserServiceException - is thrown when something wrong happens in the DAO layer.

      public int getSubscribersNumber(String searchField) throws UserServiceException

      Specified by:

      Parameters:

      Returns:

      Throws:
      UserServiceException - is thrown when something wrong happens in the DAO layer.

    • changeUserStatus

      public void changeUserStatus(boolean blocked, int id) throws UserServiceException
      This method changes the status of the user.
      Specified by:
      changeUserStatus in interface UserService
      Parameters:
      blocked - new user status. True if blocked, false if unblocked
      id - id of the user.
      Throws:
      UserServiceException - is thrown when something wrong happens in the DAO layer.

    • changeUserBalance

      public void changeUserBalance(int userId, BigDecimal difference, String description) throws UserServiceException, NegativeUserBalanceException
      This method changes the balance of the user.
      Specified by:
      changeUserBalance in interface UserService
      Parameters:
      userId - id of the user to change balance.
      difference - the difference by which to change the balance
      description - description of the transaction.
      Throws:
      UserServiceException - is thrown when something wrong happens in the DAO layer.
      NegativeUserBalanceException - is thrown when user's will be negative after transaction.

    • changePassword

      public void changePassword(int userId, String currentPassword, String newPassword) throws UserServiceException, UserNotFoundException, PasswordNotMatchException
      This method changes user's password.
      Specified by:
      changePassword in interface UserService
      Parameters:
      userId - id of the user whose password will be changed.
      currentPassword - current password of the user.
      newPassword - new user password.
      Throws:
      UserServiceException - is thrown when something wrong happens in the DAO layer.
      UserNotFoundException - is thrown when user with this id not exists
      PasswordNotMatchException - is thrown when current user's password is incorrect.

    • resetPassword

      public void resetPassword(String email) throws UserServiceException
      This method change user password for random one and sends this password to the provided email.
      Specified by:
      resetPassword in interface UserService
      Parameters:
      email - email of the user which password will be reseted.
      Throws:
      UserServiceException - is thrown when something wrong happens in the DAO layer.

    • addTariffToUser

      public void addTariffToUser(int userId, int tariffId) throws UserAlreadyHasTariffException, UserServiceException, NegativeUserBalanceException
      This method adds record for user has tariff.
      Specified by:
      addTariffToUser in interface UserService
      Parameters:
      userId - id of the user who will be added to the tariff.
      tariffId - id of the tariff who will be added to the user.
      Throws:
      UserAlreadyHasTariffException - is thrown when record with this userId and tariffId already exists.
      UserServiceException - is thrown when something wrong happens in the DAO layer.
      NegativeUserBalanceException - is thrown when user doesn't have enough balance to pay for first tariff period.

    • chargeUserForTariffsUsing

      public void chargeUserForTariffsUsing(int userId, List<TariffDTO> unpaidTariffs) throws UserServiceException, NegativeUserBalanceException
      This method charges the user a fee for using the tariff.
      Specified by:
      chargeUserForTariffsUsing in interface UserService
      Parameters:
      userId - id of the user to be charged.
      unpaidTariffs - list of Tariffs for which the user have to pay.
      Throws:
      UserServiceException - is thrown when something wrong happens in the DAO layer.
      NegativeUserBalanceException - is thrown when user's will be negative after transaction.

    • removeTariffFromUser

      public void removeTariffFromUser(int userId, int tariffId) throws UserServiceException
      This method removes record about user has tariff.
      Specified by:
      removeTariffFromUser in interface UserService
      Parameters:
      userId - id of the user.
      tariffId - id of the tariff.
      Throws:
      UserServiceException - is thrown when something wrong happens in the DAO layer.

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • getUserStatus

      public boolean getUserStatus(int userId) throws UserServiceException
      This method checks the blocked status of the user with specific uses id.
      Specified by:
      getUserStatus in interface UserService
      Parameters:
      userId - the user id to checks the blocked status of which.
      Returns:
      true if user is blocked, false if unblocked.
      Throws:
      UserServiceException - is thrown when something wrong happens in the DAO layer.
